sentences.en: " I would take up my lute and I would play, But , alas , who here would understand? "
sentences.cn: 欲取鸣琴弹, 恨无知音赏.

sentences.en: Ah! You can make that lute discourse, I perceive.
sentences.cn: 啊! 我发现,你是能够让那只弦琴发出声音的.

sentences.en: But when they didn't open the gate he sat down, took his lute and played enchanting music on it with his two forefeet.
sentences.cn: 门没开，于是，小驴儿坐下来，拿出琵琶，用两只前脚弹奏动听的音乐。

sentences.en: Even as the strings of a lute are alone though they quiver with the same music.
sentences.cn: 如同一把琴上的弦颤动于同一音乐,但彼此独立.

sentences.en: He began playing on the lute at noon.
sentences.cn: 中午的时候,他开始弹铉琴了.

sentences.en: He idly plucked the strings of the lute.
sentences.cn: 他漫不经心地拨弄着鲁特琴的琴弦.

sentences.en: He knows how to play the Chinese lute.
It is a lute to scatter songs to his mistress.
sentences.cn: 它是一只琵琶,向他的情侣弹奏爱恋的心曲.

sentences.en: Liu Fang is a remarkable virtuoso of the pipa, a Chinese lute.
sentences.cn: 刘芳是一位出色的演奏家.

sentences.en: Lute will [ oversee ] fighting in the Iraq and Afghanistan.
sentences.cn: 卢特 将视察伊拉克和阿富汗的战况.

sentences.en: Lute, play music bright for the bride fair and slender!
sentences.cn: 窈窕淑女, 琴瑟友之.

sentences.en: Sweet music was being played on the lute.
Take the plough thethe mallet the lute.
sentences.cn: 带上耕犁,带上炼炉,带上木槌,带上诗琴.

sentences.en: The instruments are mainly zhuiqin, two - string Chinese violin, dulcimer, lute and others.
sentences.cn: 伴奏乐器中, 主奏乐器为坠琴,另有二胡 、 扬琴 、 琵琶等乐器.

sentences.en: There are traditional instruments lute, strings mouth, and four - string Lusheng, and so on.
sentences.cn: 传统乐器有琵琶 、 口弦 、 四弦和芦笙等.

sentences.en: This is my opinion about the application of Hand Strum the Lute.
sentences.cn: 这是本人对这手挥琵琶演示的意见.

words.tran_cn: 涂胶泥；用油灰接合；火泥密封
用封泥封；弹诗琴（lute的ing形式）
